#summary XML-RPC Methods and Description

= Methods =

=== start_zserv() ===
  Returns: True if succeeded

=== stop_zserv() ===
  Returns: True if succeeded

=== restart_zserv() ===
  Returns: True if succeeded

=== get_uptime() ===
  Returns: An int value of the number of seconds the zserv process has been running.  This value is for the internal zserv process, and not the ZDStack process as a whole.

=== get_players() ===
  Returns: A list of dict'ed PlayerObjects.

=== get_stats() ===
  Returns: A list of StatisticsDicts.

  Usage:
  {{{
  get_stats(maps=5) # returns the stats for the last 5 maps
  }}}

=== get_maplist() ===
  Returns: A list of 2-Tuples (int map_number, string map_name)

=== get_current_map() ===
  Returns: A 2-Tuple (int map_number, string map_name)

=== get_current_stats() ===
  Returns: A StatisticsDict of the current game's stats.

=== get_last_game_stats() ===
  Returns: A StatisticsDict of the most recent game's stats.
